allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 1: Services Layer + Database Management Suite

Phase 1 Services Layer \(5 models\):
- Organization, OrganizationContact, Member, MemberEmployment, AuditLog
- Full CRUD services with business logic
- FastAPI routers with comprehensive endpoints
- Pydantic schemas \(Create, Update, Read\)
- 35 tests covering all operations \(all passing\)

Database Management Suite:
- ip2adb: Unified CLI tool for all database operations
  - Commands: seed, integrity, load, all, reset
  - Flexible options for all scenarios
  - Production safety features
- Stress Test System: Large data volumes \(10k members, 250k+ employments\)
- Integrity Check System: Data validation with auto-repair
- Load Test System: Concurrent user simulation \(10-200 users\)

Documentation \(5000+ lines\):
- IP2ADB.md, IP2ADB_QUICK_REF.md, DATABASE_TOOLS_OVERVIEW.md
- LOAD_TEST.md, LOAD_TEST_QUICK_REF.md
- STRESS_TEST.md, INTEGRITY_CHECK.md, INTEGRITY_QUICK_REF.md
- TESTING_STRATEGY.md, CONTINUITY.md
- Updated CLAUDE.md with current status

Testing:
- 51 total tests passing \(35 Phase 1 + 16 existing\)
- Performance baseline: 19ms avg response @ 10 users
- Load capacity: ~50 concurrent users
- Scaling path documented for 4000 user target

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
